website_summaries.verdict: This multi-function diaper caddy is a must-have for parents wanting a reliable product with excellent features.
pros: Includes a high-quality changing mat and matching wipe dispenser
Plastic design makes for a sturdy, easy-to-clean model
Rubber feet keep caddy in place
cons: Many customers had issues with product arriving damaged or with missing parts

customer_reviews.title: Cloth diapers
customer_reviews.text: This holds 10 prefolds, 3 covers & an extra snappi. If you cloth diaper I suggest getting this. I have had a hard time finding something that would hold the bulk of cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Beth

customer_reviews.title: wipes) it gets pretty heavy, I just keep it in one place ...
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes I think “why did I spend so much money on this?” But oh well I already spent money on it so here’s my review, With everything in it (diapers, baby powder, wipes) it gets pretty heavy, I just keep it in one place now since it was a hassle to bring it all around the house. When you lift it up the drawer slides out so easily that I had to pick up the things that fella it quite a few times. But it does have a lot of grip, I trust it won’t slide off the table with an accidental push.
customer_reviews.author: voualaa

customer_reviews.title: Quality caddy, poor changing pad
customer_reviews.text: Caddy is nice, did come dirty but nothing a good hand washing can’t fix. Drawer comes in handy for those small, need in reach baby items my dogs would normally destroy. Yoga mat changing pad smelled chemically but once washed and aired out a couple days it was fine. First big poop and the changing mat is done, material soaks it in and the stain comes back despite how much you clean it. Pretty much bought this caddy mostly for the drawer to keep small baby items organized and my dogs out of them so all in all it’s doing it’s job!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Functionality
customer_reviews.text: Really like the functionality of this product. It's well made and attractive. Easy to carry. Fits enough of products that you won't be running around because you forgot things. It can carry quite a few diapers! And it's nice that you can add on in the future if you'd like (wipe dispenser). It shipped safely with no skuffs or scratches, and in a timely fashion as well. I would definitely buy this as a gift for others or recommend to friends.
customer_reviews.author: cwright

customer_reviews.title: Useful caddy that checks off many boxes
customer_reviews.text: This diaper caddy fulfilled my needs. Originally, I was looking for a cute basket, but I'm glad I went with this for the following reasons: 1. Can easily be wiped off, making it more sanitary. 2. Changing mat is an added bonus. It quickly replaced the one I had in my diaper bag. 3. Drawer creates added storage. The only thing I am unhappy with is that the photo makes it look true white, but it is more of an off-white color and doesn't match the Ubbi wipe dispenser that I have.
customer_reviews.author: R White

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Ubbi Accessory!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased the caddy to complement my Ubbi Wipe Dispenser. Wow--this thing is awesome! I love how it easily holds and organizes all of my diapering essentials! With limited nightstand space, this has enabled me to keep everything close at hand while requiring minimal space!
customer_reviews.author: Tiarra

customer_reviews.title: Overall great purchase. Still using 20 months later
customer_reviews.text: My son is 20 months and we are still using this everyday. It’s been so great all around the house. Only reason for loss of star is the changing mat that it comes with isn’t super durable. It started peeling and falling apart after 3-4 months of use and being wiped down. I really did like it, but having to replace that quickly was a bit of a bummer. Easy enough to get a cheap one and it still fits in the slot.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Super Convenient!
customer_reviews.text: Great item. My daughter had this at her house for her new baby and it was so convenient and portable (everything you need for changing a diaper in one place!!). She's coming up in a few weeks so I ordered one to have here at our house. Much easier than a whole changing table and we can take everything we need anywhere in the house ( I wouldn't use it as a diaper bag type of item)
customer_reviews.author: JanG

customer_reviews.title: !!️Warning: this listing does not include wipe dispenser!!️
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase this version! It does not include the wipes dispenser. As of Jan 2020, Ubbi has a listing for the exact same item (at the same price) that includes the wipes dispenser. I clicked on the wrong one by mistake and ended up paying $17 for the separately listed wipe dispenser because I didn’t want the hassle of an exchange. Other than that, this is a great product! I now have one for each kid :-)
customer_reviews.author: Kate B.

customer_reviews.title: So convenient!
customer_reviews.text: This device makes it so easy, especially if you have two stories in your house, to be able to change your baby anywhere you are! You do not have to lug the baby up or down the stairs just to change them! And everything you need can be there. Be sure to order the separate wipe holder that fits inside the Ubbi!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Great as a "starter" caddy
customer_reviews.text: This product has been great, but it doesn't fit diapers larger than size 1 very nicely. The divider separating the portable changing pad from the diaper part doesn't come out so it's annoyingly useless space if you aren't using that.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Great except for the changing pad
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Only giving it four stars because the changing pad is very cheap and fell apart in less than two months. The rest of the station is sturdy and functions very well. We have a small apartment so we chose not to buy a changing table and just use this compact station.
customer_reviews.author: Cierra Struwe

customer_reviews.title: Awesome changing station!
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t realize how much this changing station would come in handy throughout the house when you need to quickly change your little one. Very durable, helps keep you organized and the changing pad is good quality.
customer_reviews.author: J. Richards

customer_reviews.title: I love this caddy
customer_reviews.text: I love this caddy. It suits my needs perfectly. Paired with the matching wipes box with the weighted dispenser, it adds a touch of luxury to an otherwise inglorious experience. You'll change so many diapers. Having the right tools to make it an organized and streamlined event takes some of the stink out of it!
customer_reviews.author: Sareece

customer_reviews.title: Stinky changing mat but everything else is good.
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid caddy. Not flimsy at all. I purchased this for $26 when it was on sale. I dont think any diaper caddy is worth shelling out $40 imo. I would just find a shower caddy or something like that then. My only gripe is that the plastic changing mat that comes with it has a strong plastic chemical smell. I am trying to air it out and I can already smell my entire room with this chemica smell.
customer_reviews.author: NotYoAverageAmazoner

customer_reviews.title: This is one of my favorite baby purchases
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite baby purchases. The caddie is just the right size and so easy to carry around to wherever you are in the house. The only thing keeping it from getting five stars is the fact that the little drawer slides out if the caddie is at all tilted, which is annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Must have baby item
customer_reviews.text: This is great!!! So durable, portable and looks good too!! The wipe dispenser is additional but it is a must have as well in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Funcional but unnecessarily expensive
customer_reviews.text: Convenient mobile changing station. No space for diaper creams. Additional cost for diaper wipe box is stupid since they are clearly meant to go together. Expensive for what it is
customer_reviews.author: Mina Kim

customer_reviews.title: Love This Diaper Caddy
customer_reviews.text: Very useful diaper caddy for diapers, lotion, cream, wipes, diaper rash cream and etc. It is very sturdy and won't break. I also like the gray changing pad. Great item!!
customer_reviews.author: Cps

customer_reviews.title: Best Gift Ever
customer_reviews.text: My cousin is obsessed with this gift!! She can’t stop telling me how much she loves the portable station she raves about it EVERYTIME she sees me!!
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed
customer_reviews.text: Obsessed with Ubbi products! This is no exception. Can’t wait to get the wipes case to Fit in it. Will use this for our living room diaper station.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Renee Paris

customer_reviews.title: Would be great, but broken.
customer_reviews.text: This was supposed to be new... and it’s obviously been bent and broken. One of the sides is bent in and one of the pieces that separates the compartments is broken. Cool!
customer_reviews.author: SSultz

customer_reviews.title: great! i'm still a baby and now i use ...
customer_reviews.text: great! i'm still a baby and now i use this caddy as my shower basket, works excellent! more than the picture shows!!
customer_reviews.author: LUIS

customer_reviews.title: Great product with one flaw
customer_reviews.text: Awesome to have just gets a bit heavy to carry at times
customer_reviews.author: Beau’s Mom

customer_reviews.title: Super functional and looks great
customer_reviews.text: We use the change every day, with our 2 month old on our marble counter and he loves it, easy to clean fold. The rest of the cady is great to neatly store all the bath essentials.
customer_reviews.author: Duare

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to your baby needs!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a baby shower and the mom loved it! It's really well built and a space save to boot! This would be perfect to carry around or keep in the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Mason

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My favorite part !!! Love this. Everything fits so perfect
customer_reviews.author: Suri

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful design and great quality! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Very functional and great quality! Would highly recommend it! I wish I would have known about this brand long ago! Would have purchased it right away!
customer_reviews.author: Rene

customer_reviews.title: I love it but...
customer_reviews.text: I love it but the bottom drawer keeps opening, when walking from room to room. It was getting a little bit annoying but my wonderful husband fixed it with Velcro
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Mobile Changing Station
customer_reviews.text: Organized all the things for changing diapers in one spot. Love the wipes dispenser- weighted lid allows for one headed pulls. Will be able to use the caddy after for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky Lotus Day

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this diaper caddy. It's a little on the pricey side but it's very sturdy and toddler proof. We had another caddy that was made of cardboard and my daughter destroyed it.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Just a little stain and one of the rubber leg seems loose. But otherwise, I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Heavier than expected. Took off one star because the changing mat was of poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Isaul Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Awesome diaper caddy
customer_reviews.text: Love this diaper caddy. The changing pad is fantastic and it fits huggies wipe dispensers perfectly. Very convenient, I have one upstairs and downstairs!
customer_reviews.author: SLRottweiler

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: In the first few weeks with a newborn this was a life saver. We kept it on our master bedroom but it was so easy to just grab to have around the house. It also was great for road trips.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Looks / Works great
customer_reviews.text: No more multiple trips to grab things. The changing pad is great too. This is perfect for babies who've grown out of a changing table.
customer_reviews.author: Brian G.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't include changing pad
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with the changing pad that it indicates is included in the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Perfect storage
customer_reviews.text: I just love this diaper storage..!! Its just the perfect size I was looking for! Fits everything i need! Thank u for this great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jung-Suk Kim

customer_reviews.title: The dispenser doesn’t look white it looks like it had been used
customer_reviews.text: The dispenser doesn’t look white it looks like it had been used :/. The picture shows white dispenser but mine came in yellow looking.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan Kaye

customer_reviews.title: Compact, lightweight, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great for small spaces or long weekends. Keeps things organized and hassle free.
customer_reviews.author: D.A

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Unlike other review i was very happy with my purchase came clean and looks super sleek i love it
customer_reviews.author: Rubi Jane

customer_reviews.title: A Must-Have Diaper Caddy!
customer_reviews.text: The perfect portable diaper caddy! It has space for all of the diaper changing items that I might need (from diapers and wipes to creams and hand sanitizer), and it comes at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: PrettyPrettyPrincess

customer_reviews.title: No wipes dispenser  :(
customer_reviews.text: Didn't come with wipes dispenser as stated in the description. Disappointed because that's what I was excited about :( maybe it was too good to be true
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: For that price it should included the wipe dispenser:/.. had to return it
customer_reviews.author: Larissa M

customer_reviews.title: I love this storage caddy because of the design
customer_reviews.text: I love this storage caddy because of the design. It's a little pricey for a storage caddy. However, the peep hole feature is nice. I use it to hold diaper liners. I also like the drawer for small things we use. The pad is a really good quality also.
customer_reviews.author: M. Siu

customer_reviews.title: This was my best gift from the baby shower!
customer_reviews.text: My son is almost 3 and I still find this diaper storage very helpful. Nice design, good quality and I could also have some diaper cream, and other handfull tubes on our dresser.
customer_reviews.author: OlgaK

product_meta.title: Ubbi Portable Diaper Changing Station Diaper Storage Caddy Organizer with Bonus Changing Mat. Stores Baby Diapers, Wipes + Baby Accessories - Gray
product_meta.description:
Style:Gray Diaper Storage Caddy OrganizerThe Ubbi Diaper Storage Caddy and Changing Mat provides parents with convenience, durability and accessibility by having all the diapering supplies organized in one portable storing unit. Made of sturdy plastic, the Ubbi diaper caddy has two main compartments for diapers and wipes, with a drawer for smaller items and a fitted space that includes a comfortable and easy-to-clean changing mat. The caddy also has an integrated handle and non-skid rubber feet allowing it to be carried around or stay safely in one place. While the Ubbi diaper caddy can store most disposable wipes dispensers, it was cleverly designed with a window that matches the Ubbi branded wipes dispenser's window for parents to know when they are running low on wipes. PVC, BPA & Phthalate free. Ubbi wipes dispenser sold separately.

DURABLE: Ubbi Diaper Storage Caddy was built to last. Ubbi’s Changing Station is made from sturdy plastic and rubber, which easily wipes clean (and can be disinfected!). The Caddy is so durable it will last you through baby #2 (or 3!).

EASY + PORTABLE: The Diaper Changing Station was designed for quick-access diaper changes: Baby playing in a different room? No need to lug them to the nursery - just grab the changer. Equipped with an integrated rubber handle, parents can quickly grab everything they need for an efficient diaper change, with minimal disruptions.

CONVENIENT: Ubbi Diaper Storage Caddy Organizer and Changing Station is your ultimate diaper changing tool! Conveniently keeps all your baby's diapering needs (diapers, wipes, and accessories) in one organized, easy-to-access place. Easy to monitor wipe dispenser window shows how full your wipe supply is, and the rubberized handle and non-slip feet make taking (or leaving) the caddy a snap.

STORAGE: Ubbi Diaper Storage Caddy Organizer has 2 main compartments to hold up to 8 diapers and was designed to hold Ubbi’s Baby Wipes Dispenser (sold separately) or most full-size wipe dispenser. A convenient slid-out drawer holds all of baby’s extras (pacifiers, nail clippers, teething gel, teething tablets, diaper cream, etc.) There is even a spot for the easy-to clean changing mat to be stored.

PERFECT ACCESSORY: The Ubbi Diaper Storage Caddy and Changing Station Nursery Organizer really is the perfect accessory for any parent. Available in a variety of different colors, the changing station is great for gift-giving: Baby shower, Christmas, Easter, Birthday, or Baby Registry, and is compatible with Ubbi’s Wipe Dispenser (sold separately) or most standard wipes dispensers.
feature_bullets: PORTABLE: The caddy functions as a convenient portable changing station, with rubberized feet and handle for easy carrying from place to place
CONVENIENT FEATURES: Cleverly designed with fitted compartments for diapers and lotions, a wipes dispenser, a changing mat and a handy drawer for small items
DURABLE AND MODERN: Sturdy plastic construction that’s easy to clean.  Clean aesthetics to fit any décor
MULTI-USE: Post-diapering, the caddy can be transformed into storage for toiletries and makeup, sewing supplies, or whatever else needed in one convenient place
BONUS: Comes with an easy-to-clean, super soft and comfortable changing mat made similar to a standard yoga mat. Material: Polypropylene

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars154 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
